original_solution_mapping.L1: Albert has to run 11 laps in total because 99 / 9 = <<99/9=11>>11
original_solution_mapping.L2: He has 5 more complete laps to run because 11 - 6 = <<11-6=5>>5

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4248.
    Returns: the number of additional complete laps Albert will have made.
    """
    # L1
    total_distance_to_run = 99 # Albert has to run 99 meters
    track_length_per_lap = 9 # The track is 9 meters around
    total_laps_needed = total_distance_to_run / track_length_per_lap

    # L2
    laps_already_run = 6 # He has already run 6 times around it
    remaining_laps = total_laps_needed - laps_already_run

    # FA
    answer = remaining_laps
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Albert has to run {total_laps_needed} laps in total because {total_distance_to_run} / {track_length_per_lap} = <<{total_distance_to_run}/{track_length_per_lap}={total_laps_needed}>>{total_laps_needed}
He has {remaining_laps} more complete laps to run because {total_laps_needed} - {laps_already_run} = <<{total_laps_needed}-{laps_already_run}={remaining_laps}>>{remaining_laps}

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.
